column2: Sonim Technologies, Inc. engages in the design and manufacture of mission-critical smart phone-based solutions for workers in extreme, hazardous, and isolated environments. The company is headquartered in San Mateo, California and currently employs 321 full-time employees. The company provides its solutions under three categories: ultra-rugged mobile phones based on the Android platform, which are capable of attaching to both public and private wireless networks; industrial-grade accessories; and cloud-based software and application services. Its devices include Sonim XP8, Sonim XP5s and Sonim XP3. Sonim XP8 is an Android-based long-term evolution (LTE) smartphone. Sonim XP5s is a purpose-built LTE feature phone. Sonim XP3 is an LTE feature phone. The firm serves the construction, energy and utility, hospitality, logistics, manufacturing, public sector and transportation sectors.
